caller_intent: Heather from Alliance Insurance seeks to waive a $15 billing fee on account 102494680, citing an agency error in failing to reinstate AutoPay, which led to a cancellation.
resolution_steps: Laura confirms Heather's agency code and billing account number.
Laura checks the system and identifies a previous fee waiver in May.
Laura explains Auto Owners' policy of allowing only one annual fee waiver.
Laura agrees to waive the current $15 late fee while leaving the billing charge intact.
knowledge_required: Auto Owners Insurance billing policies (e.g., fee waiver limits)
AutoPay system functionality and error resolution processes
summary: Heather from Alliance Insurance requested a $15 fee waiver on a billing account due to an AutoPay error. After verifying the account and confirming a prior waiver, Laura agreed to waive the current fee under the agency's annual policy limit. The call concluded with the fee waived and mutual agreement.
